shortDescription: apps/a3/cfg_ethping.cgi in the Ctek SkyRouter 4200 and 4300 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the PINGADDRESS parameter for a "u" action.
vulnerabilityName: Ctek SkyRouter 4200 and 4300 apps/a3/cfg_ethping.cgi Arbitrary Command Execution
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
